### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title: Medical Ethics Consulting Services

* **Reference Number**: CB-9299-48222868
* **Solicitation Number**: 21401-29-4491963
* **Publication Date**: September 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 13, 2023, 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2026

The Correctional Service Canada is seeking the services of a Medical Ethics Consultant to provide expert advice and guidance on the delivery of patient care within the Ontario Region. The Consultant will review medical treatment decisions and provide support to staff on complex patient care issues, ensuring compliance with the Service's ethical framework.

**Key Objectives:**

* Provide expert guidance and advice on complex patient care issues from an ethics perspective
* Review patient care plans and provide support to develop and implement an ethical framework for staff
* Facilitate staff education sessions on professional and personal ethics and the burden of care
* Produce annual summary reports identifying key themes of the ethical consultations

**Required Deliverables:**

* Annual summary report on key themes of the ethical consultations
* A minimum of one (1) staff education session on professional and personal ethics and the burden of care per year

**Eligibility:**

* This solicitation is open to all qualified contractors
* The Service is seeking proposals from contractors who have experience in providing medical ethics consulting services

**Attached Documents:**

* Request for Proposal (RFP) document
* Non-Publication Package (NPP) document

**Contact Information:**

* Danielle Murdoch
* Email: [Danielle.Murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Danielle.Murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 422-4831

**Note:**

* All submissions must be made in both English and French
* The Service reserves the right to reject any proposal that does not meet the requirements outlined in this solicitation. 400 words
